type.name: org.gradle.api.plugins.jetty.JettyStop
type.description: * Stops the embedded Jetty web container, if it is running. * * @deprecated The Jetty plugin has been deprecated

method.name: getStopPort
method.description: * Returns the TCP port to use to send stop command.

method.name: setStopKey
method.description: * Sets key to provide when stopping jetty.

method.name: setStopPort
method.description: * Sets the TCP port to use to send stop command.

property.name: stopPort
property.description: * Returns the TCP port to use to send stop command.
